content:
After all, my father was still the shop owner back then.
As for what happened next...
My memory is hazy.

content:
Cargo should stay "dead" like the lifeless things they are.
If anything "comes alive"... (draws the short blade "Kaishu")
I won't let it slide.

content:
It's an absolute mastery over "living things."
Oh, to keep what should live alive,
that is a miracle.

content:
...Lately, {短暂停}
Esassani has been suspiciously interested in my home.

content:
The Omni-Gallery is also a collection of wonders.
Recently, I observed
Mors tending to ecological vitality samples.

content:
This isn't something that can be learned.
At least, not by me.

content:
So I can't be sure if my memories are real.
Mobai and that person...
Their clothes, their personalities - everything's just too different.

content:
Glenn goes out shopping for stock every day,
and sometimes ends up with mysterious oddities by mistake.

content:
Glenn denies it, thinks I'm overthinking.
But I can tell he's acting suspicious.
No matter, I'll keep an eye on his Storage.

of the Curiosity Shop's oddities,
saying "I'll return them after I'm done."

I wouldn't be surprised.
